patthana13.2:1.1_0: Sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo
patthana13.2:1.1_1: uppajjati hetupaccayā—sukhāya vedanāya sampayutte khandhe paṭicca sukhavedanā cittasamuṭṭhānañca
patthana13.2:1.1_2: rūpaṁ; paṭisandhikkhaṇe …pe…. (Mahābhūtā natthi.) Sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ
patthana13.2:1.1_3: paṭicca nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—sukhāya vedanāya
patthana13.2:1.1_4: sampayuttaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe… sukhāya
patthana13.2:1.1_5: vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo
patthana13.2:1.1_6: uppajjati hetupaccayā. Sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasukhāya vedanāya
patthana13.2:1.1_7: sampayutto ca naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana13.2:1.1_8: Sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca naadukkhamasukhāya
patthana13.2:1.1_9: vedanāya sampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. Sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ
patthana13.2:1.1_10: dhammaṁ paṭicca nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca
patthana13.2:1.1_11: dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. Sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasukhāya
patthana13.2:1.1_12: vedanāya sampayutto ca nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya
patthana13.2:2.1_0: Dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo
patthana13.2:2.1_1: uppajjati hetupaccayā. Dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasukhāya vedanāya
patthana13.2:2.1_2: sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
patthana13.2:2.1_3: naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Dukkhāya vedanāya
patthana13.2:2.1_4: sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya
patthana13.2:2.1_5: sampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. Dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ
patthana13.2:2.1_6: paṭicca nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto
patthana13.2:2.1_7: ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. Dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasukhāya
patthana13.2:2.1_8: vedanāya sampayutto ca nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana13.2:2.1_9: Dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca nadukkhāya
patthana13.2:2.1_10: vedanāya sampayutto ca naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana13.2:3.1_0: Adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya
patthana13.2:3.1_1: sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ
patthana13.2:3.1_2: paṭicca nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Adukkhamasukhāya
patthana13.2:3.1_3: vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati
patthana13.2:3.1_4: hetupaccayā. Adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasukhāya vedanāya
patthana13.2:3.1_5: sampayutto ca naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana13.2:3.1_6: Adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto
patthana13.2:3.1_7: ca naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. Adukkhamasukhāya
patthana13.2:3.1_8: vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca nadukkhāya
patthana13.2:3.1_9: vedanāya sampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. Adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ
patthana13.2:3.1_10: dhammaṁ paṭicca nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca
patthana13.2:3.1_11: naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana13.2:4.1: Hetuyā ekavīsa, ārammaṇe ekavīsa …pe… purejāte āsevane cuddasa …pe… avigate ekavīsa.
patthana13.2:5.1: Sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana13.2:6.1: Nahetuyā ekavīsa, naārammaṇe ekavīsa …pe… nakamme nava …pe… navippayutte cuddasa …pe… novigate ekavīsa.
patthana13.2:8.1_0: Sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa dhammassa hetupaccayena
patthana13.2:8.1_1: paccayo. Sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa dhammassa
patthana13.2:8.1_2: hetupaccayena paccayo. Sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya
patthana13.2:8.1_3: sampayuttassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. Sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo
patthana13.2:8.1_4: nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa ca naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa ca
patthana13.2:8.1_5: dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. Sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo nadukkhāya vedanāya
patthana13.2:8.1_6: sampayuttassa ca naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena
patthana13.2:8.1_7: paccayo. Sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa ca nadukkhāya
patthana13.2:8.1_8: vedanāya sampayuttassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. Sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto
patthana13.2:8.1_9: dhammo nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa ca nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa ca naadukkhamasukhāya
patthana13.2:8.1_10: vedanāya sampayuttassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana13.2:9.1: Hetuyā ekavīsa, ārammaṇe ekavīsa …pe… avigate ekavīsa. (Pañhāvāraṁ vitthāretabbaṁ.)
